Module dunbar.c482pa
Package dunbar.c482pa.Controllers

Class ModifyPartWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c482pa.Controllers.ModifyPartWindowController
public class ModifyPartWindowController extends Object
The ModifyPartWindowController controls the interface used to modify existing parts in the Inventory allParts list.

  • Method Details

    • loadPart

      public void loadPart(Part selectedPart)
      Loads the current values for ID, Name, Stock, Price, Min, Max and MachineID/Company Name for the selected part.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - Part object to modify

    • changeWindowButton

      private void changeWindowButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String newAddress) throws IOException
      Loads the specified scene for a new window.
      Parameters:
      event - An action even for a button press in the GUI
      newAddress - The package address for the desired FXML file
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionInHouse

      void onActionInHouse(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Changes the label for the location text box. Sets the location label to Machine ID when the In House radio button is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by selecting the In House radio button

    • onActionOutsourced

      void onActionOutsourced(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Changes the label for the location text box. Sets the location label to Company Name when the Outsourced radio button is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by selecting the Outsourced radio button

    • onActionReturnToMain

      void onActionReturnToMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns to the Main window when the cancel button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSaveAndReturn

      void onActionSaveAndReturn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, NumberFormatException
      Saves the modified part and returns to the main window when the Save button is pressed. Generates a new Part object based off of the values in the text fields and passes them to the relevant constructor, then overwrites the original part in the Inventory allParts list using the index value.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Save button
      Throws:
      IOException
      NumberFormatException
